name: Wacom Cintiq 22
image_prompt: Wacom Cintiq 22 pen display, large screen tablet with adjustable stand, Pro Pen 2 stylus, black bezel
description: Professional 21.5-inch pen display with 1920x1080 resolution and Pro Pen 2 with 8192 pressure levels. Features anti-glare film, adjustable stand, and industry-standard color accuracy.

reviews.review_text: Industry standard for a reason. Pro Pen 2 is unmatched.
Big upgrade from Intuos. Drawing on screen is natural.
Wish it was 4K at this price point.
